title: BEN (Nasdaq: BNAI) Reduces Q4 2025 Liabilities by Approximately $2.5 Million Through Debt Conversions

title: Reels and shorts got you glued to the screen? How artificial intelligence personalises your feed by predicting what you'll watch next
description: Streaming platforms aren't mind readers. They're data scientists. Every pause, skip, rating, and search you make feeds algorithms that learn your taste, then surface content matching your quirks. This is how Netflix, YouTube, and similar services keep you glued to screens without needing a crystal ball. The Science Behind Your Next Show, Reel and Short
content: Streaming platforms aren't mind readers. They're data scientists. Every pause, skip, rating, and search you make feeds algorithms that learn your taste, then surface content matching your quirks. This is how Netflix, YouTube, and similar services kee... [1206 chars]

title: AI cheating accusations create trust issues in Michigan classrooms
description: When AI detection software fails, students and teachers have to negotiate difficult conversations about cheating with artificial intelligence.
content:
Research and Michigan educators say AI detection software meant to catch cheating students isn't effective.
Educators are instead coming up with other ways to grade and assess students.
Students in the Avondale School District have come up with a pro... [7207 chars]

title: The best 2025 fiction and nonfiction books about AI
description: Is AI a utopian promise or an existential threat? These 11 must-read books — featuring Annie Bot, Empire of AI and UnWorld — navigate the turbulent landscape of deepfakes, algorithmic bias, and the quest for Artificial General Intelligence.
content: Despite its ubiquity in our machines and in the news, artificial intelligence remains both a mystery and a source of deep anxiety across occupations and generations. My students, my readers, my colleagues and kids: We are all bewildered by the mix of... [8793 chars]

title: Uncertainty, Artificial Intelligence, Leadership, and Timeless Lessons: 4 Key Takeaways From Modern CEO in 2025
description: Modern CEO’s editor shares lessons and insights from the newsletter this year.
content:
From technological advances and geopolitical changes to workplace culture shifts and market pressures, 2025 has been a year of change, uncertainty, and disruption.

title: Delhi HC protects actor R Madhavan's personality rights, orders takedown of objectionable content
description: The Delhi High Court has protected actor R Madhavan's personality rights. Several websites and online platforms are now restrained from using his name or images for commercial gain without permission. The court also prohibited the use of artificial intelligence and deepfake technology to exploit his personality traits. Obscene content found online has been ordered for takedown.
content:

title: Can India’s IT services companies exploit their AI opportunity? We’ll know by how they fare in 2026
description: In 2026, artificial intelligence (AI) adoption will accelerate. Indian IT service firms must apply intimate knowledge of how businesses function and their unique enterprise goals to help them adopt AI meaningfully. But they’d need to move fast and exit their comfort zone.
content: People are calling this shift ‘The Great Integration,’ and it’s already taking shape. It’s not about creating new AI models, but about using the ones we already have to make real work faster, smarter and more efficient. And for Indian IT service firm... [5033 chars]

title: Google AI Studio lead says 2026 will be the breakout year for real-world robots
description: Google AI Studio lead Logan Kilpatrick has predicted that 2026 will be the year when we see more robots in the real world. Kilpatrick reckons that the coming year could see significant advancements in embodied artificial intelligence (AI).
content:
Google AI Studio lead Logan Kilpatrick has claimed that 2026 will be a big year for real-world robots. His comments come at a time when rapid advancements are being made in artificial intelligence (AI) with an increasing focus on automated robots.
